name: Andrea Farah
text: The food was good and the staff were nice. I think there were only 2 there. I was just driving through, and had never been to Jerseyville before. We stopped here for a late lunch. I'm giving 4 stars instead of five because the building needs a cleaning overhaul.

name: Adam Schneider
text: The waitress we had today was super friendly and helpful when it came to figuring out there five dollar menu options.  The hut was clean and inviting! We had pepperoni pizza and I had an order of bone out wings. For dessert we had the â€¦More

name: Carol Beiermann
text: We went to Pizza Hut for buffet night and they didn't disappoint! Plenty of options to choose from and hot & fresh!!! Great service too!

name: Donna Baze
text: No clean tables and line out the door.  No one doing anything to help.  Most of us sat at dirty tables, no silverware,  no plates on food bars, and no pizza at times.  Sad place and they didn't seem to care.  Don't plan to go back.

name: Rich Wells
text: Weak salad bar that isn't inexpensive.  Pizza is fine, though not better than standard.

name: Angela Stumpf
text: While the staff and service was great the quality of food did not seem as good as past experiences.

name: Jaci Gianella
text: Server was great. Very attentive and friendly. Found an eggshell in the eggs in put on my salad, but that was a first. Their buffet is anyways delicious, I'll give them the benefit of the doubt on the eggshell.

name: George Moody
text: Good food. It's an old building so kinda dirty. Service is normally nice! Usually not very busy.

name: Tracy Morris
text: Horrible. Wanted pizza so bad. Walked in sign said wait to be seated, so we did. After waiting awhile, finally found an employee. Told me they "don't have special ppl to show us where to sit so sit anywhere".... Tables were nasty and there â€¦More

name: Arika Wilson
text: Service was poor. The sauce on wings were sour and not anything like hot wings. The salad bar lettuce was brown and soggy. Our breadsticks were burnt. The pizza came out and the toppings were not spread out, so parts of the pizza was â€¦More

text: The pizza hut in Jerseyville Illinois is going downhill.  Pink hair in my pizza from the cook, a worker was vaping right behind the counter for customers to see, they don't know how to rise the dough.  The last several times we have been â€¦More

text: Order wings about 1 time a week every time i order wings i order well done and every time get raw bloddy food. Call to ask for replacement got an 8 piece when i bought a 16. Am contacting corporate offices and will make sure something is done with "cute" and "funny" employees.
